markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs=""
>
[Mindsponge](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2424)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Gatewalkers</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Occult" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=120" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires](/Sources.aspx?ID=195) pg. 77</row>

**Price** 700 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _mindsponge_ appears as a misshapen gray sponge that unsettlingly resembles a malformed human brain. Though pliable in all the same ways as a damp sponge, a _mindsponge_ has no ability to absorb water and, in fact, doesn't seem terribly porous at all. Instead, a _mindsponge_ is used to absorb thoughts and memories from living creatures.

<document level="2" id="action-2005" />

<document level="2" id="action-2006" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Mindsponge
